summary:
“it’s you.”

 cyrus smiled shyly. “i guess so. is-“ he paused. “is that okay?”

 jonah’s smile grew. “it’s… great.”

blog.name: intyruswestan
blog.title: Tyrus Fan
blog.description: Andi Mack blog, Mainly Tyrus, Icon credit goes to @lukemullen, porn blogs will be blocked and reported.

tags: it took me longer than expected.
summary: “Quick” Analysis of “Take a walk through my head” line:
title: “Quick” Analysis of “Take a walk through my head” line:
body:
This goes to the Anon who asked, this are my thoughts on the matter.

First lets get something straight (Lol) TJ “Smitten” Kippen has a Big Gay Crush on Cyrus:

Agreed? Okay cool.

But what are Cyrus’ feelings regarding TJ you may ask?

Let’s dig a bit deeper shall we. There is another main point we need to clarify.

Cyrus is Gay, no Jonahsexual. He can feel attraction to other boys (He is a 13 year old teenager for god’s sake, I was crushing on every boy that so much borrowed me a pen at his age), Cyrus crush on Jonah was a plot point to reveal his sexuality, but like Andi, he can like more than one boy at the same time.

And now with his crush on Jonah and Jonah himself gone. He has spent more time with TJ on Season 2B that with Jonah. 

I honestly doubt that Cyrus crush disappeared by mere chance, a couple of episodes after TJ help him do a somersault.

TJ is not only incredibly kind, attentive and supportive to Cyrus, He is also a handsome athletic boy of his same age  (He sure has a type, I wonder if he found Marty attractive?) 

So Cyrus developing attraction to the boy was just a matter of time.

I didn’t even slowed the gif, He did stare in awe at TJ for like 2 seconds.

The thing about Cyrus is that he has come a long way since the first season, when he so desperate to impress or spent time with Jonah. He is more comfortable with his sexuallity than ever before, and has spent a lot of time with TJ. (Off screen, Unfortunately) 

So I think that this line is just a way to confirm (With subtext) that Cyrus is feeling attraction to TJ. Removing the subtext would be something like this (My own interpretation of course):

“You think you have it bad, imagine what I’m feeling now. I’m falling for another straight guy!”

Everytime TJ appears on screen he shows a new positive side of himself, to the audience and to Cyrus (Being good with kids, rapping, etc.) and I would be really difficult for Cyrus to not feel attracted to him.

Despite me yelling at the screen neither TJ or Cyrus know that the other one is gay, so I assume Cyrus would not want to have another crush on a straight guy. So we just have to wait and see how the story plays out.

Anyway I’ve rambled on long enough. I hope it made sense.

Brianna - Andi Mack blog - UT

~icon created by @broadway-ace~

summary: My favorite thing about Tyrus is that tj isn’t a “stereotypical gay”. He likes sports, he’s tough, people are afraid of him,...
body:
My favorite thing about Tyrus is that tj isn’t a “stereotypical gay”. He likes sports, he’s tough, people are afraid of him, etc… it’s normalizing lgbt+ people showing that anyone can be gay. HOWEVER I’m not saying that if you are gay and you are more “stereotypical” that you aren’t normal because it’s okay to be you! All I’m saying is that it’s about the representation of all types of kids and it shows you can like guys or girls no matter what you like.


Ugh idk if this makes sense to anyone I’m sorry idk how to put it into words

dialogue.name: Cyrus while he has 1000 voice cracks
dialogue.label: Cyrus while he has 1000 voice cracks:

dialogue.name: Jonah in the middle of class
dialogue.label: Jonah in the middle of class:

tags: if you read this far thank you
body:
Jonah Beck

9 year old: Jonah likes Andi

12 year old: Jonah likes Cyrus

Me, an intellectual: JONAH LIKES THE IDEA OF PEOPLE NEEDING HIM BECAUSE HE WORRIES THAT NO ONE CARES ABOUT HIM. HE LIKES EVERYONE IN A WAY THAT FEELS ROMANTIC BUT IS ACTUALLY PLATONIC BECAUSE HE THINKS HE HAS TO BE EXTRA NICE TO GET PEOPLE TO NOT LEAVE HIM. JONAH HAS PANIC ATTACKS BECAUSE HE HAS SEVERE SEPARATION ANXIETY. HE ONLY WORRIES ABOUT CYRUS TALKING TO TJ BECAUSE HE THINKS CYRUS WILL NEED HIM LESS. HE GOES THE EXTRA MILE FOR ALL OF HIS FRIENDS BECAUSE HE IS SCARED OF NOT BEING WANTED. THIS ALSO EXPLAINS WHY HE STAYED WITH AMBER UNTIL HE HAD SOMEONE ELSE BECAUSE HE DOESNT WANT TO EVER BE ALONE OR ABANDONED. HE DOESNT ACTUALLY DEVELOP ROMANTIC FEELINGS, BUT HIS PLATONIC FEELINGS ARE AGRESSIVELY STRONG AND HE WOULD DO ANYTHING TO MAKE SURE HE ISNT ALONE.

so I’ve made a really short video I’m gonna post on YouTube discussing tyrus and the confirmation that a lot of people outside of tumblr don’t even know exists and I honestly think it’s not too bad considering it’s my first YouTube vid and my acting around a camera is shiz lol.

BUT I kinda wanna make this a regular thing? like make another vid talking about the other representation the show has etc. and it would mean a lot if you guys checked it out when it’s up? would you all even be interested in that kind of stuff? 😮

title: 30 days of Jyrus
body:
Day 5: Soulmates AU

“People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that’s what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.
A true soul mate is probably the most important person you’ll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.” 

Elizabeth Gilbert, Eat, Pray, Love

“I love having this power!”

- Cyrus Goodman at his Bar Mitzvah 

- Joshua Rush knowing all along that TJ was the one for Cyrus
trail.content:
“I love having this power!”

- Cyrus Goodman at his Bar Mitzvah 

- Joshua Rush knowing all along that TJ was the one for Cyrus

blog.name: the-c-on-your-math-test
blog.title: I'm the C on your math test
blog.description: I like making stupid videos when I'm bored :D Trying to be a negativity free blog, I live and breathe Tyrus right now 💖

tags: Constructive criticism is welcome also cause this is my first time doing this sort of thing
summary: So I made a video intending to show TJ's development from his first appearance to the end of the second season, just because I'm...
body:
So I made a video intending to show TJ’s development from his first appearance to the end of the second season, just because I’m not exactly sure when I went from despising him to wanting him to receive everything good in the world *cough* Cyrus *cough*.

Anyway, all jokes aside. If anyone’s interested I’d really appreciate the view 😊

title: But I'm a Goodman
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2M1DN0G

by Nasirdragon

Cyrus was doing the unthinkable. He was texting at dinner. Well, to be fair, he blamed his new boyfriend TJ and his adorableness. After he’d finished his homework TJ had sent him a text asking a question about Math and then all of a sudden he started to complain about some of his classmates and then people in general, other than Cyrus of course, with Grumpy Cat memes. Cyrus had responded with his brand of dinosaur memes that didn’t go well with the rest of the GHC but were a hit with his boyfriend.

blog.name: buffysmitten
blog.title: TJ Looked At Buffy
blog.description: Hi! I'm Taylor! This is my blog lol. I really like Andi Mack. My fav ships are Jyrus, Tuffy and Wandi (kinda)

summary: All I'm saying is that it's stupid for them to even SHOW buffy at all if the lookback was for cyrus. Why was she smiling like...
body: All I’m saying is that it’s stupid for them to even SHOW buffy at all if the lookback was for cyrus. Why was she smiling like that? Why did TJ speak to her last before he looked back?? His attention was on her! So much of the finale was developing the relationship between TJ and Buffy because he’s her crush…

reblog.comment: All I’m saying is that it’s stupid for them to even SHOW buffy at all if the lookback was for cyrus. Why was she smiling like that? Why did TJ speak to her last before he looked back?? His attention was on her! So much of the finale was developing the relationship between TJ and Buffy because he’s her crush…
